title: Vlad's Castle (SpliceHack)
data:
- *Not to be confused with [Castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle").*

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), **Vlad's Castle** replaces the bottom level of [Vlad's Tower](/wiki/Vlad%27s_Tower "Vlad's Tower"). The level is [no-teleport](/wiki/No-teleport "No-teleport"). The floor and walls are [non-diggable](/wiki/Non-diggable "Non-diggable").

## Map

\--------------------------------------------------------------------------  
|........................................................................|  
|.-[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")------------------------------------------------------------------[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")-.|  
|.|....................................................................|.|  
|.|............................-----------------.........---.---.---...|.|  
|.|.........[I](/wiki/Monster "Monster")..................|..[+](/wiki/Door "Door").........[+](/wiki/Door "Door")..|.........|x|.|x|.|x|...|.|  
|.|............................---|......-----------------[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---.|.|  
|.|...............................|......|.............|x[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door").........[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")x|.|.|  
|.|...............................[V](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire")[V](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire").....|.[V](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire")...........---.------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")----.|.|  
|.|...[>](/wiki/Staircase "Staircase")...........................[+](/wiki/Door "Door")......[+](/wiki/Door "Door")..............[D](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon")[+](/wiki/Door "Door")......|.[<](/wiki/Ladder "Ladder")|...|.|  
|.|...............................|[V](/wiki/Alucard "Alucard").....|.[V](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire").[V](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire").........--------.------.|.|  
|.|...............................|......|.............|x[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")......[+](/wiki/Door "Door")..[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")x|.|.|  
|.|.........[I](/wiki/Monster "Monster")..................---|......-----------------[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")---.|.|  
|.|............................|..[+](/wiki/Door "Door").........[+](/wiki/Door "Door")..|.........|x|.|x|.|x|...|.|  
|.|............................-----------------.........---.---.---...|.|  
|.|....................................................................|.|  
|.-[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")------------------------------------------------------------------[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")-.|  
|........................................................................|  
\--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Alucard](/wiki/Alucard "Alucard") V, five [vampires](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire") V, two random monsters I and a random [dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon") D are generated in the positions shown above. Additionally, eight random V, eight random Z and ten random monsters will be scattered across the level.

Of the ten spots marked x, four of them will contain an item on top of a trap. The items are:

- a [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword")
- a [lock pick](/wiki/Lock_pick "Lock pick")
- an [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak")
- a [blindfold](/wiki/Blindfold "Blindfold")

All the doors are locked.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/tower3.lua>
html:
Vlad's Castle (SpliceHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Not to be confused with Castle.

In SpliceHack, Vlad's Castle replaces the bottom level of Vlad's Tower. The level is no-teleport. The floor and walls are non-diggable.

Map

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
|........................................................................|
|.-S------------------------------------------------------------------S-.|
|.|....................................................................|.|
|.|............................-----------------.........---.---.---...|.|
|.|.........I..................|..+.........+..|.........|x|.|x|.|x|...|.|
|.|............................---|......-----------------S---S---S---.|.|
|.|...............................|......|.............|xS.........Sx|.|.|
|.|...............................VV.....|.V...........---.------+----.|.|
|.|...>...........................+......+..............D+......|.<|...|.|
|.|...............................|V.....|.V.V.........--------.------.|.|
|.|...............................|......|.............|xS......+..Sx|.|.|
|.|.........I..................---|......-----------------S---S---S---.|.|
|.|............................|..+.........+..|.........|x|.|x|.|x|...|.|
|.|............................-----------------.........---.---.---...|.|
|.|....................................................................|.|
|.-S------------------------------------------------------------------S-.|
|........................................................................|
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Alucard V, five vampires V, two random monsters I and a random dragon D are generated in the positions shown above. Additionally, eight random V, eight random Z and ten random monsters will be scattered across the level.

Of the ten spots marked x, four of them will contain an item on top of a trap. The items are:

  • a long sword
  • a lock pick
  • an elven cloak
  • a blindfold

All the doors are locked.[1]

References

  1. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/tower3.lua
